pageContext.claim: “So I'm going to be going out as many days as I can and I'm allowed to. I have sort of a lid with all the Secret Service and all the fantastic people, but it sort of holds you back.”
pageContext.analysis: Secret Service funds have been depleted due to the president's large family, multiple residences and frequent travel. The president's travel has meant many agents have hit their over time maximum, the director explained and Congress is looking into fixes. But that isn't the same as not being "allowed" to campaign.
